settings.heading: 24/7 Deals – Gym Equipment Bundles at Unbeatable Prices
settings.text:
At 24/7 Gym Equipment, our goal is simple – to help Australians build better gyms without breaking the bank. That’s why we’ve created this dedicated 24/7 Deals page. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a home gym builder, or a commercial gym owner, this is the space where high-quality equipment meets unbeatable prices. Our bundles are designed to offer the best value on the market, combining popular items into smart, money-saving packages.

Why We Created 24/7 Deals

The fitness community has evolved. People are no longer satisfied with overpriced equipment or lengthy delays. We’ve listened to our customers and learned that affordability, fast delivery, and quality are your top priorities. That’s why this page exists – to pass savings directly to you.

Our bundles combine our best-selling products, giving you everything you need for a full setup – whether that’s for weightlifting, bodyweight training, cardio, or strength conditioning. We regularly update this page with limited-time discounts, clearance stock, seasonal offers, and exclusive online packages.

What You’ll Find on This Page

The 24/7 Deals page is home to our most aggressive pricing across a range of fitness categories. Products and bundles here may include:

  • 💪 Home Gym Starter Bundles
  • 🏋️ Olympic Weight Plate Sets with Barbell
  • 🛠️ Bench + Rack Combos
  • 📦 Power Rack Packages with Attachments
  • 🔥 Discounted Dumbbell Kits
  • 🚚 Clearance and Floor Stock Specials
  • 🏠 Home Fitness Accessories Bundles
  • 💸 Bulk Buy Discounts and Combo Deals


Who These Deals Are For

These deals are ideal for:

  • 🏡 Home gym owners looking to upgrade affordably
  • 📈 PTs and fitness studios scaling their equipment collection
  • 🏫 Schools and clubs seeking value-for-money solutions
  • 🛍️ Bargain hunters chasing clearance sales and discounts
  • 📦 Anyone who wants top-tier equipment delivered fast across Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Adelaide, Australia‑Wide Delivery


Why Our Deals Are Unmatched

We buy in bulk, stock locally, and ship fast. By cutting out middlemen and working directly with manufacturers, we’re able to offer some of the best prices in Australia. Each bundle is carefully designed to provide value, balance, and compatibility. We also provide discounted or free shipping to metro areas like Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Adelaide.


Fast Delivery, Trusted Quality

All products are backed by our quality assurance guarantee. From heavy-duty squat racks to versatile fitness accessories, you’re buying gym equipment built to last. With dispatch from Sydney and courier networks, we deliver quickly to most major cities across Australia.


Save More When You Buy More

Many 24/7 Deals include extra savings when you purchase in bulk or as a package, such as:

  • 🎁 Free accessories (EZ bars, resistance bands, etc.)
  • 🚚 50% off or FREE shipping to selected areas
  • 🔁 Buy More, Save More discounts
  • 🧾 GST invoices for business purchases


How to Grab a Deal

Browse the bundles on this page, choose your option, and check out securely online. For custom packages or bulk orders, contact our team directly.


Delivery & Pick‑Up

  • Sydney Warehouse
  • Melbourne Depot
  • Brisbane Depot
  • Adelaide Depot
  • Australia‑Wide Delivery


Need Help?
📞 Call us: 0412 029 000
📧 Email us: Sales@247gymequipment.com.au
🕒 Hours: Mon–Fri 9:00 am – 5:00 pm (AEST)


Don’t miss out – check back often and follow us on social media for exclusive offers, restocks, and seasonal sales!
